titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 122 North Holderrieth Boulevard in Tomball, Texas, as the "Tomball Veterans Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 9/22/2010--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 122 North Holderrieth Boulevard in Tomball, Texas, as the "Tomball Veterans Post Office."
